57652b50-e2ae-42c5-9129-f3c240e72457.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River VxWorks 7 and Workbench Essentials. They are now able to use Workbench and tools to design and develop real-time applications for VxWorks 7. They will also have had hands-on experience with debugging, building, and testing real-time applications in a target-host development environment.
57652b50-e2ae-42c5-9129-f3c240e72457.name: Course: Wind River VxWorks 7 and Workbench Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Wind River VxWorks 7 and Workbench Essentials

d4b555d2-de45-487c-96bc-f180a51c69bb.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Simics Essentials. They are now able to use the Wind River Simics simulator to improve software development, testing, and integration processes. They have had hands-on experience networking between multiple targets, debugging target software, and analyzing target system performance and behavior with Wind River Simics.
d4b555d2-de45-487c-96bc-f180a51c69bb.name: Course: Wind River Simics Essentials

b95f4387-5a98-43a2-ab21-b28f8f9c5923.description: This person has learned about Wind River Cloud Platform and has hands-on experience with it. They can deploy, provision, and monitor the Cloud Platform and deploy user applications on it. For those applications, they can scale, upgrade, roll up/back application software releases. This person can also monitor application software, examine logs, monitor, and debug a Cloud Platform system.
b95f4387-5a98-43a2-ab21-b28f8f9c5923.name: Course: Wind River Cloud Platform Essentials

160011a6-c3fb-4a3f-b1df-58ebe0b1bbf2.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Simics Device Modeling. They are now able to describe hardware devices like counters, DMA engines, or interrupt controllers in the Simics Device Modeling Language (DML) to use in system components. This person can also use Simics features to compile the described devices and test their functionality.
160011a6-c3fb-4a3f-b1df-58ebe0b1bbf2.name: Course: Wind River Simics Device Modeling

91fea939-aab9-403e-bfe3-f2fd04a83418.description: This person has completed the course: VxWorks 7 Symmetric Multiprocessing. They understand multi-core and multiprocessing environments and can configure a VxWorks 7 system for symmetric multiprocessing (SMP). They can use VxWorks 7 tools to design, develop, and analyze SMP environments. They've performed hands-on activities with VxWorks 7 and SMP systems.
91fea939-aab9-403e-bfe3-f2fd04a83418.name: Course: VxWorks 7 Symmetric Multiprocessing

5eb4896d-1e41-46e4-a3ec-a986c6c13226.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks 7 Board Support Packages and Device Drivers. They understand the architecture for VxWorks 7 BSPs, understand the boot sequence, and boot a VxWorks 7 system using boot loaders. They will also have had hands-on experience working with a variety of device drivers and integrating them into a VxWorks kernel, along with experience with and knowledge of VxBus.
5eb4896d-1e41-46e4-a3ec-a986c6c13226.name: Course: VxWorks 7 Board Support Packages and Device Drivers

badge_template_activities.title: VxWorks 7 Board Support Packages and Device Drivers

b3a1149a-5e58-410b-858e-8a5138c7f95b.description: This person has completed an tailored instructor-led course comprised of training content from one or more courses about Wind River VxWorks. They will have learned, and have hands-on experience with Wind River VxWorks concepts and tasks. These may include building a VxWorks bootloader and kernel, developing applications for hardware and simulated targets, creating or modifying existing BSPs, developing device drivers, working with the VxWorks APIs, and potentially many other topics.
b3a1149a-5e58-410b-858e-8a5138c7f95b.name: Course: Wind River VxWorks Tailored Training

74d22592-a360-4647-8c2c-861886ddd099.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks 6.9 to VxWorks 7 Migration. Building on their knowledge of VxWorks 6, they are now able to use VxWorks 7 to design and develop real-time applications. They will also have had hands-on experience with VxWorks 7 in debugging, building, and testing real-time applications in a target-host development environment.
74d22592-a360-4647-8c2c-861886ddd099.name: Course: VxWorks 6.9 to VxWorks 7 Migration

36af8fde-c8f9-4a12-8c73-f42170cfc34f.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River VxWorks 6.x and Workbench Essentials. They are now able to use Workbench and tools to design and develop real-time applications for VxWorks 6.x. They will also have had hands-on experience with debugging, building, and testing real-time applications in a target-host development environment.
36af8fde-c8f9-4a12-8c73-f42170cfc34f.name: Course: VxWorks 6.x and Workbench Essentials

76929133-6168-42a8-8762-f255408c04e3.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Linux Device Driver and Board Support Package Development. They are now able to develop, deploy, and debug their own customized Linux device drivers in the Wind River Linux environment. They can also use Yocto Project tools to create, customize, patch, and validate new board support packages.
76929133-6168-42a8-8762-f255408c04e3.name: Course: Linux Device Driver and Board Support Package Development

838361cb-cb6d-4674-adc5-f2b829d49bcc.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Helix Virtualization Platform Essentials for Aerospace and Defense. Using Helix Platform, they are now able to develop safety-critical and standard systems in a virtualized environment running on a single hardware target. They can use also use the Helix Platform to develop, test, and debug ARINC-based safety-critical applications.
838361cb-cb6d-4674-adc5-f2b829d49bcc.name: Course: Helix Virtualization Platform Essentials for Aerospace and Defense

badge_template_activities.title: Helix Virtualization Platform Essentials for Aerospace and Defense

6bed3a69-b5f0-4ff8-81d0-38672c3743c9.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks 653 Platform 2.5 Essentials. They are now able to take a requirement specification and develop it into a working safety-critical application with the VxWorks 653 real-time operating system (RTOS). They can also use the core tools efficiently: debugger, Wind River System Viewer, monitoring, file systems, and network stacks.
6bed3a69-b5f0-4ff8-81d0-38672c3743c9.name: Course: VxWorks 653 Platform 2.5 Essentials

90c1c20e-c878-4e2b-97c1-9cc101748772.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks® 653 3.x Multi-core Edition Essentials. They are now able to take a requirement specification and develop it into a working safety-critical application with the VxWorks 653 real-time operating system (RTOS). They can also use the core tools efficiently: debugger, Wind River System Viewer, monitoring, file systems, and network stacks.
90c1c20e-c878-4e2b-97c1-9cc101748772.name: Course: VxWorks 653 3.x Multi-core Edition Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Wind River VxWorks 653 Multi-core Edition Essentials

10e559c8-653f-4c25-bd22-6a4b7e2895a0.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks 7 Cert Edition Essentials. This person understands and has hands-on experience with VxWorks 7 Cert Edition features and the DO-178C certification standard challenges, can accelerate the development and configuration of DO-178C-compliant safety-critical systems using Workbench 4, and can develop, debug, build, and test safety critical applications with the the VxWorks 7 Cert Edition real-time operating system (RTOS).
10e559c8-653f-4c25-bd22-6a4b7e2895a0.name: Course: VxWorks 7 Cert Edition Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the instructor-led course: VxWorks 7 Cert Edition Essentials.

aec5c8c8-a450-4c28-bc43-5b031b3dde35.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Linux LTS Application Development. Using Wind River Linux, they are now able to build a Linux kernel and file system, and develop applications that take advantage of advanced Linux features. They have had hands-on experience with building and installing user space and kernel packages for Wind River Linux, and debugging, building, and testing applications in a target-host development environment.
aec5c8c8-a450-4c28-bc43-5b031b3dde35.name: Course: Wind River Linux LTS Application Development

badge_template_activities.title: Course: Wind River Linux LTS Application Development

c0182965-7195-4814-a21e-9d71abd49cf0.description: Wind River Simics System Modeling This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Simics System Modeling. They are now able to use the Wind River Simics system simulator to create hierarchical component models in Python. They have had hands-on experience with Simics testing features such as checkpointing and reverse execution.
c0182965-7195-4814-a21e-9d71abd49cf0.name: Course: Wind River Simics System Modeling

413f58a0-fcf4-4a2f-b806-f9eab392f622.description: This person has participated in Wind River's Linux Basics Seminar. They have gained an understanding of Linux from a technical perspective, with a focus on embedded solutions. Starting with a foundation of Linux architecture, components, and development considerations, the participant has gained an understanding of other items when considering a Linux-based solution. These items include boot-time, end-to-end security, and virtualization.
413f58a0-fcf4-4a2f-b806-f9eab392f622.name: Wind River Linux Seminar Attendee

2c2ba0b2-5863-4e83-9e13-ba18810db042.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks 6.x Board Support Packages. They understand the architecture for VxWorks 6.x BSPs, understand the boot sequence, and boot a VxWorks 6.x system using a boot loader. They will also have had hands-on experience working with integrating VxBus drivers, and can package and validate a BSP.
2c2ba0b2-5863-4e83-9e13-ba18810db042.name: Course: VxWorks 6.x Board Support Package

9d67327e-f7db-4ddf-8250-53befd55a108.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Titanium Cloud Essentials. They have knowledge and hands-on experience with the following topics: distinguish between vanilla OpenStack and Titanium Cloud functionality, install patch and backup the system software, configure Titanium Cloud networking (provider/tenant networks, IP subnets), and exercise Titanium Cloud functionality on the virtual machine (VM) lifecycle.
9d67327e-f7db-4ddf-8250-53befd55a108.name: Course: Wind River Titanium Cloud Essentials

28f71128-553f-4ad5-9ef9-48974ce55691.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Linux LTS CLI Essentials. Using Wind River Linux, they are now able to build a Linux kernel and file system, and develop applications for hardware and simulated targets from the command line. They have had hands-on experience with building and installing user space and kernel packages for Wind River Linux, and debugging, building, and testing applications in a target-host development environment.
28f71128-553f-4ad5-9ef9-48974ce55691.name: Course: Wind River Linux LTS CLI Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Wind River Linux LTS CLI Essentials

e5084564-9ae7-4fc8-96a7-351192ee1ea8.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: SELinux Essentials. Using Wind River Linux, they now have an understanding of SE Linux concepts, can use command-line tools to manage SELinux configuration, create and manage SELinux patches, troubleshoot SELinux policies, and have hands-on experience performing these.
e5084564-9ae7-4fc8-96a7-351192ee1ea8.name: Course: SELinux Essentials

160d1848-1d94-41f0-ad0b-8282f691e605.description: This person has completed an tailored instructor-led course comprised of training content from one or more courses about Wind River Linux. They will have learned, and have hands-on experience with Wind River Linux concepts and tasks. These may include building a Linux kernel and file system, developing applications for hardware and simulated targets, creating or modifying existing BSPs, developing device drivers, developing user space applications, and potentially many other topics.
160d1848-1d94-41f0-ad0b-8282f691e605.name: Course: Wind River Linux Tailored Training

21936f42-0a3b-41ab-a2b7-a73816251b64.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks® 653 3.x Multi-core Edition Board Support Packages. They are now able to develop drivers for the POS, understand the driver initialization sequence during system boot, and pick an appropriate IMA driver model for a VxWorks 653 ARINC system. They've had hands-on experience with VxWorks 653 working with the boot sequence, communicating between partitions, using the health monitor, and device drivers.
21936f42-0a3b-41ab-a2b7-a73816251b64.name: Course: VxWorks 653 3.x Multi-Core Edition Board Support Packages

badge_template_activities.title: VxWorks 653 3.x Multi-Core Edition Board Support Packages

929d51f3-bea6-45f5-9461-7598b5a9e599.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: WRCP Conductor Essentials. They now understand and have hands-on experience with how intent-based orchestration works, can design intent-based service models, can implement basic blueprints using existing plugins, and reuse assets between existing blueprints within the WRCP Conductor environment.
929d51f3-bea6-45f5-9461-7598b5a9e599.name: Course: WRCP Conductor Essentials

4491d759-0ccf-4482-9e26-01eb0d1b3f08.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River VxWorks 5 and Tornado Essentials. They are now able to use Tornado and tools to design and develop real-time applications for VxWorks 5. They will also have had hands-on experience with debugging, building, and testing real-time applications in a target-host development environment.
4491d759-0ccf-4482-9e26-01eb0d1b3f08.name: Course: VxWorks 5 and Tornado Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Wind River VxWorks 5 and Tornado Essentials

22743e35-f482-46c1-bbef-0acfb56d6cd7.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Linux 9 CLI Essentials. They are now able to build a Wind River Linux kernel and file system, and develop applications for hardware and simulated targets from the command line. They have had hands-on experience using Wind River Linux 9 to build and install user space and kernel packages, along with debugging, building, and testing applications in a target-host development environment.
22743e35-f482-46c1-bbef-0acfb56d6cd7.name: Course: Wind River Linux 9 CLI Essentials

6341751a-b2fe-4ab9-a954-016949afd332.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: Wind River Embedded Security Essentials. They have learned how security practices and protocols apply to the embedded industry, and how they impact requirements and design. They are able to identify the key challenges in creating a secure device, describe the basics of encryption and keys, contrast secure boot on different architectures, and describe significant elements of network security, including SSH, SSL, IPsec, and IKE.
6341751a-b2fe-4ab9-a954-016949afd332.name: Course: Embedded Security Essentials

940f7551-aef8-4e3e-b65b-7efe6d7f681b.description: This person has completed the following instructor-led course: VxWorks Cert 6.x for DO-178B. In the context of VxWorks Cert 6.6, this person understands and has hands-on experience with the DO-178B certification standard, can accelerate the development and configuration of DO-178B-compliant safety critical systems using Workbench, and can Develop, debug, build, and test safety critical applications with the VxWorks Cert 6.6 real-time operating system (RTOS).
940f7551-aef8-4e3e-b65b-7efe6d7f681b.name: Course: VxWorks Cert 6.x for DO-178B
